ygData.subject: WinXP and Sound Blaster (live) music (midi) problems.
ygData.msgSnippet: First I hope this group is for the PC version of Everquest. I quit about a year and a half ago when I upgraded to Windows XP. I have a Sound Blaster Live
ygData.messageBody:
First I hope this group is for the PC version of Everquest. I quit
about a year and a half ago when I upgraded to Windows XP. I have a
Sound Blaster Live (value) card. I had the Shadows of Luclin
expansion.

The sound effects and ambient sounds were good, but the music was
horribly distorted. I did the usual card driver updates with XP and
posted to the Vault and other fan sites. Others with XP and this
sound card had the same problem. EQ support emailed me back a
response that they were aware and were working on the problem.

Before I consider coming back, I was wondering if anyone had similar
problems and were they solved with the current, new expansion I
believe is called "Planes of Power".

I'd hate to invest in the expansion to discover I still can't have
the music specific to areas within the zones. Any feedback would be
appreciated.
